title: Israel at Mount Sinai
summary: Exodus 19 describes Israelâ€™s arrival at Mount Sinai. God prepares to give them the Law and calls them to be His holy nation. The people are instructed to consecrate themselves as God descends in fire and smoke.

faq.question: What did God promise Israel if they obeyed Him?
faq.answer: That they would be His treasured possession, a kingdom of priests and a holy nation.

faq.question: How did God appear on Mount Sinai?
faq.answer: In fire, smoke, thunder, lightning, and the sound of a trumpet.
